original_title: The Dick Van Dyke Show Revisited
overview: 40 years after The Dick Van Dyke Show (1961), Alan Brady wants to hire Rob and Sally to write his eulogy - in order to win a bet with his wife. Although they don't want to do it, he offers them a huge amount of money. If Rob takes the job, Laura could open her dream dance studio.
title: The Dick Van Dyke Show Revisited
